name: Word Cave
description:
This game was created for the Eggjam #17 - Designing Around Language

In this game the goal is to get enough points from finding words to progress through the cave and come out the other side. See how fast you can make it to the end!

Words must be at least 3 letters

Controls

Activate Letter - Space, 0 (⌨) / A (🎮)

Undo Letter - Z, 5 (⌨) / B (🎮)

Move - Arrow Keys, WASD, 4862 (⌨) / D-Pad (🎮)

Restart - R (⌨) / Start (🎮)

To lock in a work use the Activate Letter button while over an activated letter.

Credits

  • https://takwolf.itch.io/retro-pixel-font
